entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then clearing. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
